title: Phreak: Hey, Lyte. Why did you promise a solo queue when you know we're never going to do that?
body:
Lyte: Hmm?

Phreak: Well, we all know dynamic queue is the future of League and that we don't care about those peasants. So why did you tell the solo players that we would make a special queue for them?

Lyte: Because I have a PhD in psychology, bitch.

Phreak: I don't get it.

Lyte: That's because you don't think, Phreak. What are they going to do, quit?

Phreak: Well, no, but -

Lyte: Exactly. They're not going to quit, they're not going to take a break from the game while they wait for solo queue. They're going to bitch about it now and then, but they'll keep playing.

Phreak: But then -

Lyte: Exactly. In a couple of months we make an announcement "Awww, so sorry LoL players, no Solo Queue, better luck next time. We tried so hard but we just couldn't do it!".

Phreak: Won't they flip all the tables?

Lyte: No, because by then they'll be so used to Dynamic Queue that they'll barely remember what they were complaining about. When you boil a frog, you turn the heat up slowly, and it never jumps out of the pot.

Phreak: Why would you boil a frog?

Lyte: Because I like to watch small things die, Phreak.

Phreak: Wow, you're really messed up.

Lyte: Yes I am, Phreak. Yes I am.
